attributes.action: Reverse the decision to start fracking underneath UK national parks
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence from numerous sources has shown that fracking is dangerous, polluting and harmful to the environment. Do we want to take the risk with the small amount of the UK that is still left to nature? This technology is still in its infancy and we do not know the long term risks and damage.  

The government are ignoring the masses with 43% of the public against it. Please sign and stop our national parks being ruined forever
Do you want this - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4LBjSXWQRV8
attributes.background: On December 16th 2015 MP's voted in favour of fracking underneath UK national parks. This was a u-turn from the previous statement of not fracking in national parks & an important decision was poorly debated over just a few hours.
